Segment.name: LN
Segment.comment: To specify information about the loan

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: DateTimePeriodFormatQualifier
Field.comment: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

Field.name: DateTimePeriod
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: FrequencyCode
Field.comment: Code indicating frequency or type of activities or actions being reported

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: LoanPurposeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the reason the loan is needed

Field.name: LoanPaymentTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the nature of loan payment

Field.name: LoanRateTypeCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the characteristics of the loan rate
